metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20407 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 1.5.1-627. There is a memory leak in AP4_DescriptorFactory::CreateDescriptorFromStream in Core/Ap4DescriptorFactory.cpp, as demonstrated by mp42hls.

notes.Note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
